```{r}
form <- as.formula(paste(paste(names(actbycol)[- 280],  
                               collapse = ' + '),
```

```{r}
library(lattice)

df <- data.frame(time = 1:10,
                 a = cumsum(rnorm(10)),
                 b = cumsum(rnorm(10)),
                 c = cumsum(rnorm(10)))

form <- as.formula(paste(paste(names(df)[- 1],  
                               collapse = ' + '),  
                         'time',  sep = '~'))

xyplot(form,  data = df,  type = 'b',  outer = TRUE)
```
